title: TRAVEL SERVICES
subtitle: I Enable an Incredible Immersive Buenos Aires Experience
text1: I prepare for your arrival to Buenos Aires and for you to have an authentic experience like a local 'porteño.' We’ll build your itinerary together based on your interests: art, architecture, sports, gastronomy, excursions, cultural activities, local history, and beyond. My role is to give you insider information and show you hidden gems within the city.
text2: I’ll accompany you as a city guide or assist you via WhatsApp throughout your stay, ensuring you have real-time support. I will also help you plan your trips to other parts of the country.
